name: READY!
description: READY! is building the infrastructure for real-money gaming. Inventors of pay to spawn, win-to-earn gameplay, READY! pushes the boundaries of gaming culture, creating a place where skill based wagering, fun, and rewards converge. READY! bridges the gap between game developers and players in crypto gaming. By providing shared infrastructure, go-to-market support, and economies of scale, READY! helps developers bring projects to life while ensuring players discover trustworthy, quality games. The platform creates a transparent and collaborative gaming ecosystem that rewards innovation and quality, offering an engaging, secure, and scalable experience for both developers and players.
